text: Hood County is a county in the U.S. state of Texas. In 2020, 61,598 people lived there. The county seat is Granbury. == History == Hood County was founded (set up) in 1866. == Geography == Hood County has a total area of 437 square miles. == Places == === Cities === * Cresson * DeCordova * Granbury * Lipan * Stockton Bend * Tolar == References == Category:Texas counties
title: Hood County, Texas
